title: Status broke
body: Status is broke i asked a couple friends and they couldnt change their Statuses.  i found you have to click around it millions of times before it lets you then sometimes you click to fast then you miss it.  This sucks but its just a minor bug.  Please fix if possible Q~Q

replies.body: Actually, no. Clicking it like that isn't how it works. lol. There's a sweet spot. Just click once beside your green dot and you'll be able to change your status. By "clicking a million times and then it lets you, then doesn't", I'm guessing you're moving your cursor around and clicking in that one spot then moving your cursor away. Is what I'm guessing you're doing.

its still a bug cuz you use to be able to click any where on your status to change it.  But thanks for the help and advise ^^

You're welcome, and yeah, I suppose I should've explained a bit more. It is a bug that happened after this patch. It was a reported a few days later. http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/zE6AGv0z-client-no-more-personal-message-thingy? So it should be fixed next week when Patch 5.4 comes out.
This is a known issue, and we're working on a fix! In the meantime, you can click the gear icon on the friend list to change your status. :]
